definitions: A piece of furniture with a mattress and pillows, used for sleeping or resting.
A plot of ground, usually rectangular, in a garden or on a farm, in which plants are grown.
The bottom of a body of water, such as a river, lake, or ocean.
A layer or stratum of rock or other material.
examples: I made my bed this morning.
The gardener prepared the flower bed.
Fish swim at the bottom of the river bed.
The coal bed was rich in resources.
